history.content:
Hi, if you want to explore entrepreneurship and use your expertise, please join us!

We're a team of an entrepreneur, ML engineer and investment banker, three current Berkeley students. We are aiming at UCLaunch, STEP (we have been admitted by STEP), and other accelerator programs in 2022. While we are exploring an entrepreneurship project, we are looking for undergraduate students to join the team. We expect you to help us build an app and website platforms. No worries, you are not alone. You will be guided by the engineer in the team who was admitted by both Stanford and Berkeley programs. 

You will also gain real-world experience building a social network app with real impact. If you could commit enough time and energy, we will work as partners to discuss product, marketing, funding, and other critical aspects of a startup project. We're also happy to share our knowledge and resources for your career growth or entrepreneur journey!


If interested, please contact yuguang_yuan@berkeley.edu or shoot me a call 415 340 9616
